ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 40
ygData.msgSnippet: I went to the Trainer for Wizards last night and found nothing that had to do with specializing in anything.  Is it implemented yet? I successfully made the
ygData.messageBody:
I went to the Trainer for Wizards last night and found nothing that had to
do with specializing in anything. Is it implemented yet?
I successfully made the Enstill spell at level 20, and failed at level 19.
Also, Enstill seems to just take longer to cast, and supposedly holds them
longer. Doesn't seem to work any better than Root, if anything worse(lack
of use I hope).
Zebbi from E'Ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Rob Funk [mailto:rfunk@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 8:20 AM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Digest Number 40


From: rfunk@...

What class does "us" refer to? How do you get specialization is it back in
at the trainer? Also what effect does specialization have on casting? Mana
cost? Speed? Resistance? Fizzles? Research success?

I am so full of questions today. =)

BTW, I tried to research Enstill yesterday and it said I lacked the skill to
fashion an item. =( My research is maxed for my level, any ideas as to what
level one would get the ability to pull that one off easily? I need Enstill
the creatures now just laugh at my root spell.

-- Elidain, 20th level Erudite Wizard Veeshan

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Shane [mailto:xscion@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 9:39 AM
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Digest Number 40
>
>
> From: "Shane" <xscion@...>
>
> Well guys, looks like we finally got Specialization, now
> Necromancers get to
> cast even faster than us!
